accbindTips: Please login with your existing username and password to bind your account to your WeChat ID.
AccessSharingRescueWallet: Access and sharing of rescue wallet in an emergency
accountActivationEmailHelp: TIP – if our activation email is not in your inbox:
accountActivationEmailStep2: Search your email for “iCE Angel – ID” in cases where your email provider automatically categorizes your email into various category inboxes
accountActivationEmailResend: Before you request a new activation email link, please complete the following steps:
accountActivationEmailResendStep2: Search your email for “iCE Angel – ID” in cases where your email provider automatically categorizes your email into various category inboxes
accountActivationEmailResendStep3: Add our domain “{websiteUrl}” to your safe sender list via your email account settings
accountActivationEmailResendHelp: HELP – if you still did not receive your activation email link, then please send us a direct email from your email account to {supportEmail} requesting us to manually activate your account.
accountActivationSuccess: Account is now activated. Please login to your account
accountDoesNotExist: Account does not exist. Please register an account
accountProfileIsNotCompleted: Step 1/4:Please finish your profile, make it a first priority
accountSecurityMessage: These answers can be added as an additional security measure to reset your lost password. Your answers are case sensitive
acknowledge: By tapping "OK", I acknowledge the iCE Angel – ID™
addAnEcp: You should add at least one Emergency Contact Person
addAnEcpWithStep: Step 2/4: You should add at least one Emergency Contact Person
addAnEcpWithStep4:
Dear {name}

I joined 天使救援 iCE, a global medical alert and emergency identification system. I may need your help in case of emergency - for medical or security issues. Please scan the QR code below to either (i) sign up; or (ii) login to your iCE Angel - ID™ account - and then accept my emergency contact person invitation in your account message centre.
addAnEcpWithStep4Note: NOTE: This invitation is linked to mobile number {number}. If this is not your mobile number - or if you plan to / or have already signed up an iCE Angel - ID™ account using a different mobile number, please ask the sender to resend this invitation using your correct mobile number.
addAnEcpWithStep4OverLay: Send this invitation to your selected emergency contact person by clicking "Send to Chat"
AdministerUptoFiveMemberProfiles: Administer up to five member profiles
alipayPaymentMessage: Please complete the transaction in the external pop-up window.
androidchinastore: Our Android app is pending copyright approval for the Tencent app store. Meanwhile the app file can be downloaded from this [link].
apiKeyReplaced: Your existing API Key will be replaced
angelCanScanText: Or if you are unconscious or unable to help yourself, any caring "Angel" can assist you by scanning your emergency QR code.
appIsOfflineBody: Please check your internet connection and try again
beforeAlertingMessage: Before alerting the member's emergency contact persons, you should call the police or ambulance. This is the first and most important step.
bySyncingYouCanMessage: By syncing your iCE Angel - ID™ number to this app, you can create a personal panic button to trigger an alert for yourself in event of an emergency. Only registered members can activate this function.
cancelAndLeave: Do you really want to cancel the changes and leave this page?
cancelSubscription: Your subscription is set to auto-renew. Are you sure you want to turn off this setting?
canTransferToIndividualAccountMessage: Instead, you can also transfer this member to their own independent account
cardIdNotDownload: Access the download / print functions via WeChat desktop version in case of failure
chooseFromListDescription: You can nominate an existing emergency contact person from another member
completeProfileRecommendedMessage: For you and / or your loved ones, it is highly recommended that you enter a complete member profile. In event of an emergency, this valuable information can be life saving. It will only take a moment to complete this information.
connectDesc1: Invite a family member, friend or doctor to be your emergency contact person
connectDesc2: Custom preset the information you wish to share with each of them
connectDesc3: Add dependent family members to your account for easy administration
contactNumberRequiredMessage: Your contact number is required so that one of the member's emergency contact persons can call you.
copyright: Copyright © {year} iCE Angel - ID™. All rights reserved.
couponCodeSuccessfulApplied: You now only have to pay USD {valueAfterCouponApply} :)
couponCodeSuccessLifeTime: You have received a free lifetime premium subscription!Tap 'Pay' to complete the process.
couponCodeSuccessMonthPremium: You have received a free {freeMonthPremium} month premium subscription!Tap 'Pay' to complete the process.
csvFileValidation: Only csv file format can be uploaded
customPrivacySettingsRescueWallet: Custom privacy settings for rescue wallet
declineEmergencyContactNominationSure: Are you sure you want to decline the emergency contact person nomination?
declineGuardianNominationSure: Are you sure you want to decline the guardian nomination?
declinePanicSyncRequestSure: Are you sure you want to decline the panic button sync request?
deleteAccountReason1: I have chosen not to use medical alert and emergency identification
deleteAccountReason2: I have chosen to use an alternate form of medical alert and emergency identification
deleteAccountReason3: I no longer require medical alert and emergency identification
disclosureRescueAngelContactDetails: Disclosure of Rescue Angel's contact details
dontHaveEmergencyContactsList: You don't have any existing contacts to choose from.
dontHaveGuardianInList: You don't have any guardians listed. Please nominate a guardian.
ECPInvitationTxt: Please click here, click share, forward this page to your WeChat friend to invite him/her as your ECP.
ECPInvitationTips: I joined ICE Angel id, when some emergency happend to me, I need to have your assistance to help me contact for medical and security aid. Please fill following form to sign up and confirm my invitation.
ecpToAcceptNomination: Remind your emergency contact person to accept your nomination
ecpWechat: Enter emergency contact person's information. Please ensure that their mobile number is correct!
emailUpdated: Your email has been successfully updated. Please login with your new email.
emergencyAlertNotificationSMS: Emergency alert notification via WeChat message
emergencyAlertTriggeredBy:
An iCE Angel - ID™ emergency alert has been triggered for
{firstName} {lastName} {time}.
emergencyAlertTriggeredFor: An emergency alert has been triggered for {fullName} {time}.
emergencyAlertTriggeredName: {fullName}’s emergency alert has been triggered
emergencyChannelMessage_old: In case of emergency, we will notify you via (a) your account email address, and (b) push notification (if you have installed our APP). For absolute safety, PLEASE link your Facebook Messenger account so that we can direct message you in an emergency.
emergencyChannelMessage: In case of emergency, we will notify you via (a) your account email address, and (b) push notification (if you have installed our APP).
emergencyChannelMessageForWechat: In case of emergency, we will notify you via (a) WeChat; (b) email; and (c) app push notification. For absolute safety, PLEASE install and setup the 天使救援 iCE app so that we can send you push notifications in an emergency.
emergencyHappenMessage: Emergencies can happen to anyone, anywhere, and anytime
emergencyNotificationAppPushNotification: Emergency alert notification via APP push notification
emergencyNotificationFacebookMessenger: Emergency alert notification via Facebook Messenger
emergencyNotifications: Emergency push notifications and email messaging
emergencyNotificationTwitterMessage: Emergency alert notification via Twitter Direct Message
emergencyProfileInformation: To get started with your emergency profile, please complete some essential information.
emergencyShareText: Your location, medical, and insurance records are shared with your family in an emergency - and this information can save your life.
enterMemberEmail: Please enter your member's email address so we can send an invitation to create an independent account
ecpEmail: Enter emergency contact person's email address
expirelink: Sorry, this verification link is only valid for 4 hours. Please redo.
farewell: Your account has been successfully deleted. We are sorry to see you go. Thank you for using our iCE Angel - ID™.
fileUploadingWait: Please wait, it might take a while
guardianNominationSent:
We have sent your guardian nomination to {email} and are waiting for their reply.
Feel free to remind them to accept your nomination
hasMemberPreparedWill: Has the member prepared a will?
headerDescription: iCE Angel - ID™ is a global medical alert and emergency identification platform that instantly alerts families in Case of Emergency anywhere in the world, and provides crucial access to location information, medical history, and insurance details.
iceAngelIdLogo:
天使救援™ 
iCE Angel - ID
idWillGenerateAfterFinishing: The iCE Angel - ID™ number will be generated on completion of this profile
iHaveReadTerms: By registering for iCE Angel – ID™, I acknowledge the Privacy Policy and accept the Terms of Use
iHaveReadWechatRegister: By registering for iCE Angel – ID™, I acknowledge and accept the
incorrectEmailPassword: The email address and iCE Angel - ID™ number do not match up. Please try again
incorrectIdPassword: The password and iCE Angel - ID™ number do not match up. Please try again
incorrectUsernamePassword: Incorrect username or password, please try again
inputEmailAddress: Please enter an email address to share this profile
inputEmailToVerify: Please enter the registered account email address so that we can verify you, and send a request to the account holder to link your panic button to their account
isMemberRegisteredOrganDonor: Is the member a registered organ donor, or would the member like to become an organ donor in event of a brain or cardiac death?
isThereOtherImportantInformation: Is there any other important information that the member would like to disclose to their emergency contact person(s) or medical personal in case of an emergency?
landingCardDescription: Create as many emergency QR cards as you want. Save it on you on your mobile phone lockscreen, or store them in your wallet, your handbag, your car, your sports bag, your motorcycle, your cell phone case, and your pocket. Attach them to your school bag, your bicycle, your keys, and your outdoor gear. Take your iCE Angel - ID™ wherever you go!
landingDescription: iCE Angel - ID™ is the world's first comprehensive medical alert and emergency identification system that provides you with the double safety of a panic button AND an emergency QR code to ensure that your family can always be contacted in an emergency, anywhere in the world.
learnMoreAboutPanicButton: Learn more about the panic button function
limitedQuantities: * Limited quantities - first come, first served.
linkExpired: This shared profile is no longer available. You should contact the member directly.
linkSentToMail: A link has been sent to {email} to reset your iCE Angel - ID™ account password. Please check your email account.
liveDesc1: Press your panic button, or if you are unconscious, any Angel (rescuer) can simply scan your emergency QR code card
liveDesc2: Either way, an alert is immediately sent to your emergency contact persons
liveDesc3: They will see your location and preset information, which they can easily share with your doctor
memberBirthDayRequired: Member birth date day is required
memberBirthMonthRequired: Member birth date month is required
memberBirthYearRequired: Member birth date year is required
memberIdRequired: iCE Angel - ID™ number is required
name: Name
needToLinkAtLeatOneContact: You need to link at least one emergency contact person
nominateMyselfDescription: As the account holder, you are by default an emergency contact person for this member. You may nominate up to two additional contacts.
nominateNewGuardianDescription: Nominate a new guardian by sending an email invitation
paidUserEnjoyedRecordKeeping: Premium accounts can store and share emergency records, administer up to five members, and monitor their account history. Join Now!
panicButtonSyncSentMessage: Your panic button setup request has been sent to {fullName} for approval. Please contact and remind them to accept your request.
panicButtonTriggeredMessage: An iCE Angel - ID™ panic button has been triggered by {fullName} {time}.
panicButtonTriggeredName: {fullName}’s panic button has been triggered
panicMobileAppSetup: Step 4/4:  Setup your mobile app panic button
passwordPopUpText: You are using a system assigned password. Please update your account password via the "Settings" menu.
peaceMessage: iCE Angel - ID™ offers total peace of mind for you and your family
phoneNumberAlreadySync: Your previous phone number is synced to one or more panic buttons. You may want to unsync those panic buttons and set them up again using your new phone number.
photoUploadRecommendation: Recommend a square photo. Less than 3MB .JPG or .PNG
pleaseAnswerToReset: Please answer the following security question in order to reset your password. Your answer is case sensitive
pleaseCheckFaq: Please check out our FAQ for answers to frequently asked questions.
pleaseContactAngel: Please contact the angel at: {phone}
pleaseContactMoreInfo: If you have not received an email reply from us within 48 hours, it is most likely because your email server is blocking or filtering our emails. In this case, please try contact us via the “Messenger” button our Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/iceangelid/.
pleaseEnterValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
pleaseFollow: Please follow {twitteraccount} to receive notifications.
pleaseInputPassword: Please enter your password to delete your account
pleaseInputPasswordToResetQuestions: Please enter your password to reset your security questions
printLockScreenInstructions: Please copy and paste the link below into an external web browser:
printStep1: Print the image on white paper using a color printer if possible to ensure that your iCE Angel - ID™ logo is immediately recognized in event of an emergency.
printStep2: Cut the paperalong the outside border lines using scissors
printStep3: Fold the cut-out along the dotted line
recommendedAtLeatOneGuardian: It is strongly recommended that at least one guardian is linked to your account at all times
registerSuccess: You have successfully sign up, Please click following button to activate your account, after activatation, we will return to login. If you want to unbind your WeChat account, please sign out.
registerSuccessWechatText: Close this screen and login via the "Account" menu option.
registrationAgeMessage: You must be at least 16 years old to register as an iCE Angel - ID™ account holder
removeContact: It is strongly recommended that members have two emergency contact persons linked at all times. Are you sure you want to remove {ecp} as an emergency contact person?
removeContactFor: You are an emergency contact person for {ecp} Are you sure you want to remove yourself?
removeContactSure: Are you sure you want to remove {ecp} as an emergency contact person?
removeECPPartner: You are an emergency contact person for {ecp} Are you sure you want to remove yourself?
removeGuardianAtLeastOne: It is strongly recommended that at least one guardian is linked to your account at all times. Are you sure you want to remove {guardian}?
removeGuardianFor: You are an account guardian for {guardian} Are you sure you want to remove yourself?
removeGuardianSure: Are you sure you want to remove {guardian} as your account guardian?
requestTimedOut: Oops something went wrong. Please try again, or contact us for assistance
rescueWalletDetails: Rescue wallet: medical, insurance, and other emergency records
safariPrivateView: Our website is not compatible with your browser settings
securityAnswerIncorrect: Your security answer is incorrect. Please answer the new security question
securityExplanation: When requesting a password re-set, you may add an extra layer of security by answering the questions below:
sendContactNominationSuccess: We have sent your emergency contact person nomination to {contactEmail} and are waiting for their reply. You should remind them to accept your nomination.
sendGuardianNominationSuccess: We have sent your guardian nomination to {guardianEmail} and are waiting for their reply. Feel free to remind this person to accept your nomination.
shareprofilemodal: Please scan following QR code or click the button to open the profile sharing page to share to your doctor or friend.
shareSuccess: This profile has been shared via email
shareThisProfileOverlayText: Share this confidential profile by clicking "Send to Chat"
shareThisProfileText: This shared iCE Angel - ID™ profile belongs to {profilename}. The profile will expire in {expiretime}. Please consider it confidential.
signDesc1: Securely store your medical, insurance and personal data in one place
signDesc2: Easily sync your panic button for worldwide use
signDesc3: Instantly download your personal emergency QR code card, and lockscreen ID
storeAdditionalDetails: Store your insurance details, medical history and other records here
stripeBoxInfo: Visa Platinum, Visa Signature, and Visa Infinite cards issued in China are eligible for a free one year premium subscription. Simply complete the payment form with your Visa card and enter the first 6-digits of your card number in the 'Coupon Code' field to activate your free subscription.
sureRemoveMember:
Are you sure you want to remove {fullName} from your account and the iCE Angel - ID™ system?

Once deleted, the member cannot be reactivated.
sureWantToDelete: Are you sure you want to delete your account? Once you delete this account, it's gone forever.
sureWantToRemoveGuardian: Are you sure you want to remove {name}?
syncSuccessful: Your iCE Angel - ID™ member number has been successfully synced to this app and your panic button has been set up
thankYouForSigningIn:
Thank you for signing up to iCE Angel - ID™.

We are glad to have you join our community.

Before you can get started, you will need to verify your email address by clicking on the verification link we sent to your email address: {email}.
thankYouForSigningInWX: Please click following button to activate your account, after activatation, we will return to login. If you want to unbind your WeChat account, please sign out.
thankYouForSigningInWXTips: Please click following button to activate your account, after activatation, we will return to login. If you want to unbind your WeChat account, please sign out.
thankYouForYourInquiry: Thank you for your enquiry to iCE Angel - ID™. We will respond as soon as possible.
travelInsuranceRecommendedMessage: Medical insurance usually only provides domestic cover. It is recommended that you purchase travel insurance if you are traveling abroad.
triggerPanicSuccessfulMessage: Your cellular number {phone} has been sent to your emergency contact persons.
unlinkAccountFromWechatMessage: Are you sure you want to unlink this account from your WeChat?
unlinkAccountFromWechatSuccessMessage: Successfully unlinked, but you will remain logged into your iCE Angel - ID account in WeChat until you click "Log Out" on the main menu
unsyncPanicFromDeviceMessage: Un-sync the panic button on this mobile device if you wish to change (i) your cellular number; or (ii) your mobile device.
wechatboundmp: You frined invite your as his ECP, please long press following QR code to follow our WeChat official account.
wechatboundNomination: For optimal user experience, please scan the following QR code to login to your account via WeChat.
whatIsIceAngelText: iCE Angel - ID™ is a safe and secure emergency alert system that offers peace of mind, and connects you to your family anywhere in the world.
woaqrcodeMsg: Please long press above QR code to follow our offcial account, then please login again.
youCanCallThemRightNow: You can contact them right now
youCanPressPanicButtonMessage: Trigger your one-touch panic button to alert your family in an emergency.
youHaveTriggeredPanicButton:
You have triggered your panic button.
You have {timer} seconds to cancel and undo this action.
yourAccountIsNowLocked: Your account has been locked. Please to resolve this issue.
yourAlertHasBeenTriggered:

contact persons to call you at
copiedins: Copied. Paste in external browser to view
marketingcontent: Now, with a free global Smart Pass to display verifiable digital certificates of your COVID-19 tests and vaccination to facilitate safer public spaces for all.
appdownloadstring: Install the APP and setup your panic button
